metadata.title: CVE-2018-10289 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In MuPDF 1.13.0, there is an infinite loop in the fz_skip_space function of the pdf/pdf-xref.c file. A remote adversary could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
